plugin.name: Blend-Charm
plugin.description:
A PyCharm Plugin that simplify the development of Blender Add-On inside the PyCharm IDE.

Available for boot Community or Professional editions of PyCharm.
plugin.change-notes:
Change Log:
-Self-Update repository URL's for auto updating the plugin whenever a newer version is released.
-Added console links. Now you can click a file in the Blender Output Console to open it in PyCharm.
-Added Local Inspection for bl_idname syntax.
